abstract: Big-ticket acquisitions by Cisco Systems, Oracle and a variety of buyout firms helped drive software mergers and acquisitions to record levels so far this year. An analyst firm, The 451 Group, takes a look at the nearly $28 billion in software deal activity in the first five months of 2007.
